conversations.description: User asks for a 200‑word review on CRISPR gene editing advances, receiving citations in APA style.
Researcher requests a comparison of COVID‑19 vaccine efficacy studies from PubMed, with extracted findings and MLA citations.

Scholar asks for a paragraph on the relationship between gut microbiome and mental health, with bullet‑point findings.
